subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amare Stoudemire scored 36 points last night as the Phoenix Suns withstood Carmelo Anthony’s first triple-double and the loss of Steve Nash to beat the ailing Denver Nuggets, 113-108.
snippet: Amare Stoudemire scored 36 points last night as the Phoenix Suns withstood Carmelo Anthony’s first triple-double and the loss of Steve Nash to beat the ailing Denver Nuggets, 113-108.
